field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs)⩓exists(select 1 from #unit b where @@table.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and @@table.so_ct = b.so_ct having count(b.ma_dvcs) > 1)⩓not exists(select 1 from sysunitrights b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and b.user_id = @user and b.r_new = 1)

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: not exists(select 1 from hrnv where ma_dvcs = @@table.ma_dvcs and ma_nv = @@table.ma_kh and (@@admin = 1 or bo_phan in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_Inlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID)) and status = '1')

field.name: ma_vt
field.check: ma_vt <> '' and ma_vt not in (select ma_loai from hrdmtngt where loai = '1')

field.name: thang_kt1
field.check: thang_kt1 < 1 or thang_kt1 > 12 or thang_kt1 > thang_kt2

field.name: ma_nt
field.check: ma_nt not in (select ma_nt from dmnt)

text.v: Chứng từ khấu trừ thuế TNCN
text.e: Certificate of Personal Income Tax Withholding

processing.text: &CheckVoucherRightBeforeProcess; declare @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(512), @locked nvarchar(512), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(8), @voucherID varchar(8) declare @master varchar(16), @detail varchar(16), @inquiry varchar(16), @general varchar(16), @baseCurrency varchar(8), @datetime0 char(21), @d0 datetime declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @m int, @y int, @max1 int, @max2 int, @count int, @roundPrice int, @roundAmount int, @roundFAmount int select @d0 = getdate(), @datetime0 = convert(char(8), @d0, 112) + ' ' + convert(char(12), @d0, 114), @status = left(replace(@status, '''', ''), 1) select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @master = 'hrm&Detail;$', @detail = 'hrd&Detail;$', @inquiry = 'hri&Detail;$', @general = 'hrc&Detail;$000000', @voucherID = '&Code;' select @locked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày chứng từ tại dòng %s.' else N'Data is locked, please check the date of voucher at row %s.' end select @duplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Chứng từ số %s1 ngày %s2 tại dòng %s3 đã tồn tại.' else 'The voucher number %s1 dated %s2 at row %s3 already exists.' end select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @roundPrice = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_gia' select @roundAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' select @roundFAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien_nt' select @max1 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @master + '000000' and column_name = 'so_ct' select @max2 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @detail + '000000' and column_name = 'so_lsx' -- Checking update @@table set so_ct = space(@max1 - len(rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)))) + rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)) &ImportOverwriteData; if @check$Unit <> '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join hrc&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join hrc&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end else begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C002' from @@table a join hrc&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join hrc&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end if @r is not null and @$mode <> 1 begin if @check$Unit <> '1' select replace(replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r else select replace(replace(replace(replace(@duplicate$Unit, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', rtrim(ma_dvcs)), '%s4', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end -- Update update @@table set stt_rec_nv = c.stt_rec, ma_nt = case when a.ma_nt <> '' then a.ma_nt else @baseCurrency end, ten_vt = case when a.ten_vt <> '' then a.ten_vt else isnull(b.ten_loai, '') end, ten_kh = case when a.ten_kh <> '' then a.ten_kh else isnull(rtrim(c.ho_nv) + space(1) + ltrim(c.ten_nv), '') end, mst_kh = case when a.mst_kh <> '' then a.mst_kh else isnull(g.ma_so_thue, '') end, dia_chi_kh = case when a.dia_chi_kh <> '' then a.dia_chi_kh else isnull((case when c.dia_chi_ht is null then '' else rtrim(c.dia_chi_ht) end) + ', ' + (case when c.dia_chi_ht_quan is null then '' else rtrim(e.ten_quan) end) + ', ' + (case when c.dia_chi_ht_tinh is null then '' else rtrim(d.ten_tinh) end), '') end, doi_tuong = case when a.doi_tuong <> '' then a.doi_tuong else isnull(case when g.doi_tuong = '2' then '0' else '1' end, '1') end, quoc_tich = case when a.quoc_tich <> '' then a.quoc_tich else isnull(f.ten_qt, '') end, so_giay_to = case when a.so_giay_to <> '' then a.so_giay_to else isnull(c.cmnd_so, '') end, ngay_cap_giay_to = case when a.ngay_cap_giay_to is not null then a.ngay_cap_giay_to else c.cmnd_ngay_hl end, noi_cap_giay_to = case when a.noi_cap_giay_to <> '' then a.noi_cap_giay_to else isnull(h.ten_tinh, '') end, dien_thoai_kh = case when a.dien_thoai_kh <> '' then a.dien_thoai_kh else isnull(left(c.dien_thoai_dd, 20), '') end, email_kh = case when a.email_kh <> '' then a.email_kh else isnull(c.email_cty, '') end from @@table a left join (select ma_loai, ten_loai from hrdmtngt where loai = '1') b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_loai and a.ma_vt <> '' left join hrnv c on a.ma_kh = c.ma_nv left join hrdmtinh d on c.dia_chi_ht_tinh = d.ma_tinh left join hrdmquan e on c.dia_chi_ht_quan = e.ma_quan left join dmqt f on c.quoc_tich = f.ma_qt left join hrtttncn g on c.stt_rec = g.stt_rec left join hrdmtinh h on c.cmnd_noi_cap = h.ma_tinh select top 0 ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct into #unit from hrm&Detail;$000000 insert into #unit select ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct from @@table group by ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct -- Locked Date &CheckValidEmailCommandCheckingImport; &ImportLockedDateCheck; @@checking(1); &CheckTaxCodeExtImport; &ImportOverwriteChecking; &EndErrorMode; -- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id from hrm&Detail;$000000 insert into #id(stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, stt) select '', a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, min(a.stt) from @@table a&ImportOverwriteIdentiyDataCondition; group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct select identity(int, 1, 1) as id, cast(stt as int) as stt, convert(varchar(8), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct as c, cast(0 as int) as ln into #ln from @@table order by ngay_ct, so_ct, stt exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateLineNumber create index i on #ln(stt) select @count = count(*) from #id exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @@userID &ImportOverwriteProcess; select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_vt, ten_vt, thang_kt1, thang_kt2, nam_kt, thue_suat, tnc_thue_nt, tnc_thue, giam_tru_nt, giam_tru, tnt_thue_nt, tnt_thue, thue_nt, thue, bh_bb_nt, bh_bb into #hrd&Detail; from hrd&Detail;$000000 insert into #hrd&Detail; select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_vt, a.ten_vt, a.thang_kt1, a.thang_kt2, a.nam_kt, a.thue_suat, round(tnc_thue_nt, case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then @roundAmount else @roundFAmount end), round(a.tnc_thue_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), round(giam_tru_nt, case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then @roundAmount else @roundFAmount end), round(a.giam_tru_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), round(tnt_thue_nt, case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then @roundAmount else @roundFAmount end), round(a.tnt_thue_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), round(thue_nt, case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then @roundAmount else @roundFAmount end), round(a.thue_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), round(bh_bb_nt, case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then @roundAmount else @roundFAmount end), round(a.bh_bb_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount) from @@table a join #id b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt select top 0 stt_rec, status, ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, stt_rec_nv, ten_kh, mst_kh, dia_chi_kh, email_kh, doi_tuong, quoc_tich, so_giay_to, ngay_cap_giay_to, dien_thoai_kh, noi_cap_giay_to, ghi_chuhoadon, thue_suat, ma_nt, ty_gia, t_tnc_thue_nt, t_tnc_thue, t_giam_tru_nt, t_giam_tru, t_tnt_thue_nt, t_tnt_thue, t_thue_nt, t_thue, t_bh_bb_nt, t_bh_bb, t_thanh_toan_nt, t_thanh_toan into #hrm&Detail; from hrm&Detail;$000000 -- Total select top 0 stt_rec, t_tnc_thue_nt, t_tnc_thue, t_giam_tru_nt, t_giam_tru, t_tnt_thue_nt, t_tnt_thue, t_thue_nt, t_thue, t_bh_bb_nt, t_bh_bb into #total from #hrm&Detail; insert into #total select stt_rec, sum(tnc_thue_nt), sum(tnc_thue), sum(giam_tru_nt), sum(giam_tru), sum(tnt_thue_nt), sum(tnt_thue), sum(thue_nt), sum(thue), sum(bh_bb_nt), sum(bh_bb) from #hrd&Detail; group by stt_rec insert into #hrm&Detail; select b.stt_rec, @status, a.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt_rec_nv, a.ten_kh, a.mst_kh, a.dia_chi_kh, a.email_kh, a.doi_tuong, a.quoc_tich, a.so_giay_to, a.ngay_cap_giay_to, a.dien_thoai_kh, a.noi_cap_giay_to, a.ghi_chuhoadon, a.thue_suat, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, d.t_tnc_thue_nt, d.t_tnc_thue, d.t_giam_tru_nt, d.t_giam_tru, d.t_tnt_thue_nt, d.t_tnt_thue, d.t_thue_nt, d.t_thue, d.t_bh_bb_nt, d.t_bh_bb, d.t_tnc_thue_nt - d.t_thue_nt, d.t_tnc_thue - d.t_thue from @@table a join #id b on a.stt = b.stt join #unit c on a.ngay_ct = c.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = c.so_ct join #total d on b.stt_rec = d.stt_rec select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec_nv, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, status, user_id0, c$, m$, d$, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #hri&Detail; from hri&Detail;$000000 insert into #hri&Detail; select stt_rec, stt_rec_nv, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, @status, @user, convert(varchar(12), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(stt_rec_nv) + '#15$' + rtrim(1) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_nt), '' from #hrm&Detail; select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#hri&Detail;', '#hrd&Detail;', 'd$', 'ma_vt', '#20$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q declare @p varchar(32), @masterTable varchar(32), @detailTable varchar(32), @inquiryTable varchar(32), @insertKey varchar(128) select distinct month(ngay_ct) as m, year(ngay_ct) as y into #k from #id select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k while @r is not null begin select @m = m, @y = y from #k where y * 12 + m = @r select @p = rtrim(@y) + replace(str(@m, 2), ' ', '0'), @insertKey = 'month(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@m) + ' and year(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@y) select @masterTable = @master + @p, @detailTable = @detail + @p, @inquiryTable = @inquiry + @p select @q = @@inserting(master, @masterTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(detail, @detailTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(inquiry, @inquiryTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q &ImportOverwriteInsertingByPart; select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k where y * 12 + m > @r end @@inserting(general); &ImportOverwriteInserting;
